### dumb quine solution  {.smaller}


```
#include <stdio.h>
int main(void) {
    char buffer[1024];
    FILE *f = fopen("quine.c", "r");
    size_t bytes = fread(buffer, 1,
                         sizeof(buffer), f);
    fwrite(buffer, 1, bytes, stdout);
    return 0;
}

```
 

* a lot more straightforward!
* but ‘‘cheating’’
